name: flatworld
description: Game engine for 2D turn-based strategy games in browsers
author: Janne Hyyti√§

scripts.start: echo 'starting instance in http://localhost:9001/' && forever start startEngine.js
scripts.nextVersion: echo 'MANUAL: npm version patch/minor/major && git tag -a ?.?.? -m 'comment' && git push --tags && update CHANGELOG && update roadmap if needed'
scripts.showDocuments: echo 'starting instance in http://localhost:9002/' && forever start startDocument.js --uid FlaTWorldDocument
scripts.init: npm i -g forever && ln -s /usr/bin/nodejs /usr/bin/node && npm install
